type.description: Type of the traffic generator/measurement tool.  (moongen-combined first runs an rfc2544-style measurement then calls the latency measurement limiting the tx rate to the result of the rfc2544 limit)

rate-limit.description: Config parameter of the hw rate limiter.  It is relevant only when type is 'moongen'.  The default (0) does not set the rate limiter.  Due to the inaccuracies of the limiter, the actual TX rate is different from this parameter.

uplink-port.description: Port name ('eth1') or pci addr for DPDK ('0000:0b:00.0') or DPDK port number (in case of moongen, e.g., '0') [TODO: we could calculate this from the pci_addr]

downlink-port.description: Port name ('eth1') or pci addr for DPDK ('0000:0b:00.0')  or DPDK port number (in case of moongen, e.g., '0') [TODO: we could calculate this from the pci_addr]

core.description: number of CPU cores to use

moongen-cmd.description: Absolute path of the MoonGen executable

setup-script.description: Absolute path of the custom Tester setup script

teardown-script.description: Absolute path of the custom Tester teardown script
